data.message:
Join The Ultimate Facts
Michael Jackson had a
Interview
in one of the Twin Towers in
the
morning of the 9/11/2001. But
he missed it because he
overslept due to Drugs.
The Ultimate Facts
Alcohol makes people appear 5
times
more attractive than they really
are. 

The Ultimate Facts
Facebook is blue because
founder
Mark Zuckerberg is red-green
colorblind, which means that
the best
color he can see is blue.
The Ultimate Facts
Ostriches are often not taken
seriously. They can run faster
than horses, and the males can
roar like lions.
The Ultimate Facts
Akon's full name is Aliaune
Damala Bouga Time Puru Nacka
Lu Lu Lu Badara Akon Thiam. 
The Ultimate Facts
The 2011 earthquake in Japan
has
shortened the day on planet
Earth by
1.8 microseconds.
The Ultimate Facts
Nazi leader Adolf Hitler had
only one testicle.
The Ultimate Facts
Join The Ultimate Facts for More Facts
www.facebook.com/ultimatefactsofficial
